title: (x) Renaissance Hotels sans serif - Oceania {Riccardo Sartori}
content:
Hi folks! Can't remember if I asked about Renaissance Hotels' new identity or not (my memory's not what it used to be), but I've now got a much higher resolution copy of the logo, and was hoping someone out there might be able to help me identify the fonts in this, as what I _was_ using now looks completely wrong.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014062459im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Renaissance_4116.jpg)

Any and all assistance is greatly appreciated!
author: iskippy227

comments.content:
Heh...whoops. Guess I did post about it. Mea culpa.

Any idea for the hotel name in my pic?

CASA DE PALMAS reminds me of Taz by Luc(as)de Groot:  
 [http://www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/taz/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014062459/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/taz/ "http://www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/taz/")

I think CASA DE PALMAS is [Anomoly](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014062459/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-alias/anomoly/) by Gareth Hague.

- Mike Yanega
